ApplyCertificate.document: This example shows you how to apply for a free certificate.
ApplyCertificate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyCertificate
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DvAuthMethod": "DNS_AUTO",
    "DomainName": "wgc.red"
}
ApplyCertificate.title: Applying for a free certificate

CreateCSR.document: This example show you how to create a CSR.
CreateCSR.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCSR

{
    "Domain": "www.***.com",
    "Organization": "Tencent",
    "Department": "It",
    "Email": "abc@qq.com",
    "Province": "Hunan",
    "City": "Changsha",
    "Country": "China",
    "EncryptAlgo": "ECC",
    "KeyParameter": "prime256v1",
    "Generate": false
}
CreateCSR.title: Creating a CSR

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: CreateCertificate

    "DomainNum": 1,
    "TimeSpan": 1
}
CreateCertificate.title: Creating a Certificate
